synopsis.text: He ed the call to challenge the indomitable Bell Daikokuten, the undisputed leader of the Bey graveyard known as 'Makai no Mon.' Brandishing the formidable Dynamite Belial, Bell brazenly declares war on Bladers from all corners of the globe. The whispers of his unyielding prowess echo throughout the Beyblade world, drawing legendary Bladers into the fray. As Bell hijacks worldwide broadcasts to announce his challenge, even the renowned Valt Aoi steps forth to confront this self-proclaimed 'Demon King.' Brace yourself for an epic showdown as the world unites against the invincible Bell, marking the beginning of the Demon King's legend.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
